item.description:
This is a place holder until there is more information available as to when the open tasting is scheduled.

$15 dollars, taste various chili's.

http://www.chili-fest...

Welcome to a celebration of National Chili Day 2010
This is an exciting new family event. The entire 5th floor of the Convention Center becomes a chili loverâ€™s paradise guaranteed to warm you up on a cold mid-winter day.

Sample from a delicious variety of chili recipes prepared by local and regional chefs showcased in the People's Choice competition. Watch and learn from world champions as they compete in the International Chili Society's Rhode Island State Cook-Off. Enjoy culinary demonstrations by renowned chefs.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the 1st floor lobby on Sabin Street with a meetup sign at 1pm. If you arrive late, phone me to find us in the show.
item.name: Rhode Island Winter Chili Festival
